newsitem.title: UKRAINE: Ukraine Oct inflation 1.5 pct vs 2.0 pct -minister.
newsitem.headline: Ukraine Oct inflation 1.5 pct vs 2.0 pct -minister.

text.p: Ukraine's monthly inflation rate slowed to 1.5 percent in October from 2.0 percent in September, Economy Minister Vasyl Hureyev said at the weekend.
Hureyev, speaking at a draft budget review meeting with President Leonid Kuchma, also forecast November inflation of 1.5 percent.
The Statistics Ministry has not released inflation data for October yet.
Ukraine's 1997 draft budget foresees annual inflation of 25 percent next year, and inflation this year is forecast at 45-48 percent. --Kiev Newsroom, +380 44 229 2264
